name: Urthan, Infernal Sovereign
description: A fiery demon king with crimson hair, clad in dark obsidian armor. He wields a burning chain blade, standing majestically in a throne room filled with lava and pillars of fire. The sovereign of hellfire who refines faith through rage, the only being capable of wielding the Abyssal Loop.
description_ch: 一位熾熱的惡魔之王，擁有緋紅色的頭髮，身穿深色的黑曜石戰甲。他手持燃燒的鏈刃，威嚴地站在充滿熔岩與火柱的王座廳中。地獄烈焰的統治者，以怒焰煉化信仰，唯一能使用深淵之輪的存在。
